title: Land to sale In Melder Place Nugegoda - 80 Perches
details:
We have a land to sell in Melder Place Nugegoda.

Land Extent - 80.9 Perches
Price per Perch - 2,300,000

At the moment it is rented for a company but they will vacate 31st December 2017

Rent per month - 427,000 + Vat

If the new owner happy to rent it to the same people they are happy to stay.
Survey plan Attached.

If you are interested please call
